<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Peacemaker](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1231)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 186</row>

**Price** 35 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision, manipulate</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** Your last action was an Interact action to stow the affixed firearm or crossbow.
</row>

</column>

---

This ragged piece of white cloth is wrapped around the grip, stock, or haft of the affixed weapon. When you activate the talisman, you gain the effects of a [_sanctuary_](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) spell (DC 20) lasting for 1 minute. If you draw the affixed firearm, the effect ends immediately and the talisman crumbles.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
